data.name: His Journey
data.detailed_description:
What is His Journey?



His Journey is an Adventure-Platformer where your main objective is to get to the portal. getting to the portal advances you to the next level.
when you are traveling from level to level you also make some friends and some enemies >:)




Why Should I Care?



His Journey may look like just a simple game with bad graphics, but on the inside, it is quite the opposite
His Journey also has a lot of epic content that can be viewed in the trailer like grappling, boss battles, new characters, and more!

make sure to wishlist!








Features


• Singleplayer/Story mode - 2 - 4 hours
• Level Editor
• English & Spanish (more to come)

data.short_description: His Journey is an Adventure-Platformer where your main objective is to get to the portal to get to the next level. You can also have many powers like speed boost, Jump boost, grappling, and more. with your powers, you can defeat bosses and find out how to get out of this dark abyss!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Block makes me go Y E S”
8/10 – Frostbite Games
